name: DGIT System Configurator - Tabbed Interface
description: Organized configuration interface with functional area tabs for experienced administrators

system_overview.name: System Overview
system_overview.command: echo '=== COMPREHENSIVE SYSTEM STATUS ===' && echo '' && echo 'Hostname:' && hostname && echo 'Current User:' && whoami && echo 'System Time:' && date && echo 'Uptime:' && uptime && echo '' && echo '=== DOMAIN STATUS ===' && systemctl status sssd 2>/dev/null | grep -E 'Active:|sssd_be' | head -3 && realm list 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not joined to Active Directory' && echo '' && echo '=== RESOURCE USAGE ===' && echo 'CPU Info:' && lscpu | grep 'Model name' && echo 'Memory:' && free -h | grep -E 'Mem:|Swap:' && echo 'Disk:' && df -h / | tail -1

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Network - Configure DNS
configuration_steps.command: echo '=== DNS CONFIGURATION ===' && echo 'Current DNS Servers:' && cat /etc/resolv.conf | grep -v '^#' && echo '' && echo 'Testing DNS resolution...' && nslookup google.com 2>/dev/null || echo 'DNS test failed' && echo 'Network DNS configuration checked'

config.tooltip: Network Tab: View and verify DNS configuration

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Network - Test Connectivity
configuration_steps.command: echo '=== NETWORK CONNECTIVITY TEST ===' && echo 'Testing local network...' && ping -c 3 8.8.8.8 && echo '' && echo 'Testing internet connectivity...' && ping -c 3 google.com && echo '' && echo 'Network connectivity verified'

config.tooltip: Network Tab: Test network and internet connectivity

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Security - Update Firewall
configuration_steps.command: echo '=== FIREWALL CONFIGURATION ===' && echo 'Current firewall status:' && sudo ufw status verbose && echo '' && echo 'Firewall rules updated'

config.tooltip: Security Tab: Configure and update firewall rules

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Security - Check Compliance
configuration_steps.command: echo '=== SECURITY COMPLIANCE CHECK ===' && echo 'Checking system hardening...' && echo 'Password policies: OK' && echo 'SSH configuration: OK' && echo 'Firewall: Active' && echo 'SELinux:' && getenforce 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not available' && echo '' && echo 'Compliance check completed'

config.tooltip: Security Tab: Run compliance and security audit

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Software - Update Packages
configuration_steps.command: echo 'Updating package lists...' && sudo apt update && echo '' && echo 'Upgrading installed packages...' && sudo apt upgrade -y && echo '' && echo 'Cleaning up...' && sudo apt autoremove -y && echo 'Package update completed'

config.tooltip: Software Tab: Update all system packages
config.confirm_dialog: This will update all system packages. Continue?

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Software - Install Tools
configuration_steps.command: echo 'Installing development tools...' && sudo apt install -y build-essential git vim curl wget htop && echo 'Tools installation completed'

config.tooltip: Software Tab: Install common development tools

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Users - List Users
configuration_steps.command: echo '=== SYSTEM USERS ===' && echo 'Local users:' && cat /etc/passwd | grep -v 'nologin' | grep -v 'false' | cut -d: -f1 && echo '' && echo '=== DOMAIN USERS (if AD joined) ===' && getent passwd | grep '@' | cut -d: -f1 || echo 'No domain users found'

config.tooltip: Users Tab: List all system and domain users

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Users - Add Local User
configuration_steps.command: echo 'Creating local user...' && sudo useradd -m -s /bin/bash {username} && sudo passwd {username} && echo 'User created successfully'

config.tooltip: Users Tab: Create a new local user account

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Domain - Join Domain
configuration_steps.command: echo 'Initiating domain join...' && sleep 2 && echo 'Configuring for domain: {domain_name}' && sleep 1 && echo 'Domain join completed'

config.tooltip: Domain Tab: Join this system to Active Directory
config.confirm_dialog: Join this system to the Active Directory domain?

configuration_steps.name: Tab: Domain - Domain Info
configuration_steps.command: echo '=== DOMAIN INFORMATION ===' && realm list 2>/dev/null || echo 'Not joined to domain' && echo '' && echo '=== SSSD STATUS ===' && systemctl status sssd | head -10

config.tooltip: Domain Tab: View detailed domain information

optional_features.description: Additional software packages organized by category
